article.title: Where was I for last two years?
article.author: Mario Bašić
article.excerpt: Nearly two years have passed since I have closed down my blog on Laravelista.

authors.bio: Full stack web developer, author of the book “A Collection of Laravel Tutorials” & creator of open-source Laravel packages.
